name: Boa Hancock
text: On Play: Up to one of your opponents characters other than [Monkey.D. Luffy] cannot attack until the end of their next turn. Then, place up to one cost 1 or less character on the bottom of its owner's deck.

effect.text: Up to one of your opponents characters other than [Monkey.D. Luffy] cannot attack until the end of their next turn. Then, place up to one cost 1 or less character on the bottom of its owner's deck.
